content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":48983,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d037d308-ae64-41fd-bf25-777ba693bdf8/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d037d308-ae64-41fd-bf25-777ba693bdf8/Picture1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture1.png\",\"name\":\"Picture1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d037d308-ae64-41fd-bf25-777ba693bdf8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":759,\"height\":129},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Continuous improvement is a true focus of EPAM based on information from different sources across the entire organization – customers, clients, employees. During your career path, you will face the necessity of getting such information about you as an Employee and about your team members as a Manager. Moreover, to improve yourself and your team you need to know what to improve and how to find a way to grow as a professional. Feedback will help with all these questions.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feedback is a valuable part of performance management process in EPAM. It's a continuous process and a tool for getting and providing consolidated feedback about the insights of how employees achieve their work results, that can be provided by colleagues and customers.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is very important for Resource Managers to involve their team members in the Feedback process and engage them to get feedback about employee in specific roles from different sources. Results of the feedback process are supposed to help Managers explore points to improve as well as the strength of their team members, make opinions on the performance of employees more objective and act as a basis for 1-to-1 discussions and professional opportunities and career path.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager's role in Feedback is your team’s Feedback process and manage feedback roles for your employees\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"See your employee's feedback page, where you can request and review feedback.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Manage automatically aggregated summary or aggregate it
